[align=center][img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/w-purple.png[/img]

[b][size=xx-large][color=#ffffff][u]Hack Forum News - Edition Ten[/u][/color][/size][/b]

[b]The Hack Forum News Team welcomes everyone back this week with another update on the weekly news to keep you up to date on the latest news on site and around the world. If you have never heard of Hack Forum News, dont worry we have you covered. We are a team of members from the Hack Forums community who are journilists and writers, and we are here to keep you in the loop of the changes around the site and now even around the world.[/b]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/headlines.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=121196]

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6305900][color=#ffffff]Bulk Upgrade Deals (OMUP)[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
[mention=1] is introducing a new opportunity for vendors to purchase upgrades in bulk at discounted rates, which can then be gifted as value-adds to their customers. This allows vendors to bundle premium benefits with their own products or services, enhancing their overall offering. A dedicated control panel will also be provided, giving vendors full control to manage and distribute these upgrades directly to buyers at their convenience.

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6299864][color=#ffffff]Hack Forums News - Weekly Reports & Suggestions[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=2331053]
A quick reminder to all members: we do our best to catch as much Hack Forums news as possible, but we‚Äôre only human and can‚Äôt cover every single development. If you come across something you believe is noteworthy, we encourage you to post a submission in the official thread so it can be considered for inclusion.

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/gaming-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer - [/b][/size] [mention=811]
[color=#72FF84][b]Notable console & hardware releases:[/b][/color]


[color=#FFFF44]ROG Xbox Ally leaked release date:[/color]

A reliable insider has claimed that the highly-anticipated ROG Xbox Ally handheld consoles will launch in October 2025. While Microsoft and ASUS have yet to formally confirm these details, all signs point to a Gamescom 2025 reveal for the ROG Xbox Ally release date.
[spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/hVauQd8.png[/img][/spoiler]

[color=#FFFF44]ASUS could be teasing towards a new Xbox controller:[/color]

The first ASUS controller was released back in 2023, giving the company more than enough time to weigh customer response and adjust this new controller in whatever ways necessary. Through a YouTube Short on its official channel, ASUS has given a sneak peek at a new Xbox controller. The short video shows the general Xbox shape of the controller with a small sighting of paddle buttons on the back.
[video=youtube]https://youtu.be/WyRyHC0t6zc[/video]
[spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/5SV1Jn7.png[/img][/spoiler]


[color=#72FF84][b]Notable News (August 2025)[/b][/color]

[color=#FFFF44]McDonald‚Äôs plans to crack down on Pokemon scalpers:[/color]

McDonald‚Äôs has recently announced new rules aimed at fighting scalpers for the next wave of its Pokemon-themed Happy Meals in Japan. Platforms such as eBay currently have offerings going as high as $1,000 for 50 sealed packages, and individual cards like the Pikachu reaching out for the burger costing between $20 and $40.


[color=#FFFF44]The State of Louisiana is suing Roblox:[/color]

The state of Louisiana has filed a lawsuit against Roblox for its failure to protect kids from predatory behavior. More than half of the player base, 56 percent, is aged 16 and below, yet there is no minimum age to play the game, no age verification, and no need for parental permissions. On August 14, Louisiana Attorney General Liz Murrill filed a ‚Äúchild protection‚Äù lawsuit against Roblox for ‚Äúpermitting and perpetuating an online environment in which child predators thrive.‚Äù

This has led to multiple documented instances of children being groomed and even abused as a result of their interactions with predators while playing. In July, a Des Moines, Iowa, [url=https://gamerant.com/roblox-sued-13-year-old-girl-kidnapped/]family filed suit against Roblox after their 13-year-old daughter was abducted and assaulted by a stranger she met on the gaming platform.[/url] The girl had been playing Roblox since she was eight years old, which her parents allowed because they believed it was safe. But the ‚Äúchild‚Äù she was chatting with and later agreed to meet up with turned out to be a 37-year-old man named Martin Amaya Sandoval, who already had statutory assault charges pending against him in another state.




[color=#FFFF44]Rumor: EA wants Battlefield to become an annual release:[/color]

A new rumor has suggested that EA wants to turn Battlefield into an annual franchise in the vein of Call of Duty. Battlefield General Manager Byron Beede, saying, "their goal is three studios making Battlefield on a three-year basis. So they can get to Battlefield annually. He said it's going to take five or six years before they get two in a row, so we're not going to get there for a while."



[color=#FFFF44]Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Leak reveals how many 6x6 maps there will be at launch:[/color]

There will be a lot of maps to play on for the upcoming BO7. Black Ops 7 will feature 16 6v6 maps at launch with three BO2 remakes.

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/contests.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6305248]
$100 USD (BTC) Contest || Celebrating My Acceptance in The Academy[/url] By [mention=4189082] [/color][/size][/b][/u]

A new contest has been created this week by @W1NK1LL3RX@. They have recently been accepted into The Academy, and they feel like it's time for them to share the love by making a massive $100 BTC giveaway to one lucky winner. Let's make sure to spread the love, and thank them for the contest. The contest ends September 30th, 2025. Make sure you get yourself entered before it's too late.

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6303368]$75 ETH Crypto Contest | Celebrating my upgrade to L33T[/url] By [mention=5670768] [/color][/size][/b][/u]

If you are looking to get your hands on some free ETH, the user known as [mention=5670768] has the thread for you. They have recently started a contest for everyone on site, and you can get your hands on an entry right now. All you will need to do is head over to the thread and follow the three steps to enter, and you could get your hands on that $75 ETH on the 2nd of September. Good luck to everyone who enters!

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6303945]$50 Crypto Contest || Celebrating my upgrade to Ub3r[/url] By [mention=5655318] [/color][/size][/b][/u]

Another contest is also giving away $50 worth of free crypto too. This member has recently just got themselves Ub3R on site and is celebrating becoming Ub3R by giving away to one lucky winner a $50 crypto. Once again, they have a few requirements for the contest, but everyone can easily enter this lovely contest and will get themselves an easy $50 to do whatever they want with it. Make sure you check this one out as it's worth checking it out!

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/tech-header.png[/img]  
[size=medium][b]Writer - [/b][/size] [mention=5465469]


[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]IBM and Google claim quantum breakthrough[/color][/size][/b][/u]  

IBM and Google say they are closing in on practical, large-scale quantum computers after major engineering milestones, with IBM outlining a roadmap for the rest of the decade and Google touting new error-correction advances. Both claim the tech could move from lab to limited commercial use sooner than expected, though others urge caution on timelines.  

[b][url=https://nypost.com/2025/08/12/business/ibm-google-claim-breakthroughs-in-push-for-quantum-computers/]Source[/url][/b]  

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Australia eyes cashless, cardless future by 2030[/color][/size][/b][/u]  

A new Australian Mobile Technology Association study predicts physical cash, plastic cards, and even passwords could disappear by 2030. Driven by advances in 6G connectivity, biometrics, and wearable tech, the shift would see payments handled via phones, smart rings, and glasses seamlessly integrated into homes, cars, and workplaces.  

[b][url=https://www.heraldsun.com.au/news/victoria/australian-mobile-technology-association-study-predicts-we-wont-need-cash-cards-or-passwords-by-2030/news-story/a34423af7da52dd820575e7cbfa1ecab]Source[/url][/b]  

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Pixel 10 leaks continue ahead of launch[/color][/size][/b][/u]  

Fresh leaks for Google‚Äôs Pixel 10 series show marketing renders and confirm specs such as a 6.8‚Ä≥ Super Actua display, Tensor G5 chip, up to 16 GB RAM, and refined camera hardware. Alongside the phones, the Pixel Watch 4 is tipped to debut with new colors and a redesigned dock, while Meta teased new ‚ÄúTiramisu‚Äù and ‚ÄúBoba 3‚Äù VR prototypes at SIGGRAPH 2025.  

[b][url=https://www.androidcentral.com/phones/google-pixel/news-weekly-aug-9-2025]Source[/url][/b]  

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Afterpay Day 2025 brings major tech discounts[/color][/size][/b][/u]  

Shoppers in Australia rushed to take advantage of Afterpay Day 2025 deals running August 14‚Äì17. Discounts included Samsung Galaxy S25, iPhone 16, Dyson vacuums, TCL TVs, and more. Many offers required Afterpay, making it one of the biggest retail events before the holiday season.  

[b][url=https://www.techradar.com/deals/afterpay-day-sales]Source[/url][/b]  

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]IonQ sets sights on trillion-dollar quantum future[/color][/size][/b][/u]  

Quantum computing firm IonQ announced ambitious plans to become the ‚ÄúNvidia of quantum,‚Äù raising $1 billion in funding and targeting a $1.1 billion merger with Oxford Ionics. CEO Niccolo de Masi says the company is positioning itself to dominate the quantum race within the next decade.  

[b][url=https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/niccolo-masi-ionq-plans-quantum-computing-dls5vkkxb]Source[/url][/b]  

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Jumia stock surges 71% in one month[/color][/size][/b][/u]  

African e-commerce giant Jumia saw its stock price soar by 71% in the past month and 50% year-to-date. Analysts say the rally reflects renewed investor optimism, although the company‚Äôs fundamentals remain under scrutiny.  

[b][url=https://simplywall.st/stocks/us/retail/nyse-jmia/jumia-technologies/news/jumia-technologies-ag-nysejmia-stocks-shoot-up-71-but-its-ps]Source[/url][/b]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/world-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Trump-Putin summit fallout continues[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Vladimir Putin described his August 15 meeting with Donald Trump in Alaska as ‚Äúuseful and timely,‚Äù though no formal agreement was reached. Meanwhile, media reports suggest the U.S. may host a trilateral meeting involving Trump, Putin, and Zelenskyy before August 22 to address a broader peace settlement, amid concerns that Ukraine could face pressure to concede the Donbas region.

[b][url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/ukraine-to-lose-donbas-trump-to-reportedly-host-putin-zelenskyy-trilateral-before-august-22-russia-firm-on-core-demands/articleshow/123341774.cms]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Pakistan Flash Floods[/color][/size][/b][/u]

A rare cloudburst triggered flash floods in Buner, claiming hundreds of lives and leaving widespread devastation. Water, rocks and trees were swept down the mountainside after two days of intense monsoon rains, burying people and homes in their path.

[b][url=https://www.usnews.com/news/world/articles/2025-08-17/flash-floods-devastate-buner-pakistan-after-rare-cloudburst-kills-hundreds]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]McLaren duo locks battle for championship[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Oscar Piastri, leading the 2025 F1 standings with 284 points, says it‚Äôs essentially a ‚Äútwo-horse race‚Äù with teammate Lando Norris, who trails closely on 275. With ten races to go, Piastri remains focused on a disciplined, race-by-race approach.

[b][url=https://www.news.com.au/sport/motorsport/formula-one/oscar-piastri-spills-on-f1-world-title-fight-with-mclaren-teammate-lando-norris/news-story/c59fbf46bf50ec03cbc3af3677d01aa2]Source[/url][/b]
[/align]
